column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////WOW!! If you believe palates have orgasms
column2: this is the place to get them.  On a date with "The One"? Skip your romantic expensive dinner and go straight to your 120 second sex session
column3: when you wake up spend the dinner money at this place.  Is very rare to find breakfast places that would rival a good dinner
column4: but i guarantee Common Bond will not dissappoint. This place has not failed to deliver. I love the idea that they are constantly changing their menu
column5: so even when you don't know what you are going to get
column6: you get quality ingredients.  The only thing that is a con about Common Bond is the parking
column7: be ready to fight for a parking spot like the crazy ladies you hear on the news during the Christmas season.
